title: 我的世界服务器地皮怎么设置不刷怪~
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: a1457370814
replies.txt_content: 关掉生成动物/mv modify set animals false 地皮名 关掉生成怪物/mv modify set monsters false 地皮名

replies.author: 周润发
replies.txt_content:
站在地皮世界 输入/gamerule doMobSpawning false
即可= = = 求最佳

replies.author: mc:ypy0000
replies.txt_content:
/mv modify set difficulty [难度]

难度:0[和平] 难度:1[简单] 难度:2[困难]
